projects.title: Vulkan Engine
projects.summary: Deferred renderer (G-buffer), SSAO/HBAO, post-FX, ImGui tools.
body: Built a Vulkan deferred renderer with a full G-buffer pipeline.
Implemented SSAO/HBAO experiments and post-processing passes.
Added ImGui tooling for profiling and debugging.

projects.title: Vehicle Physics (Jolt)
projects.summary: Jolt VehicleConstraint sandbox with wheel sync, chase cam, and tuning.
body: Integrated Jolt VehicleConstraint into a custom ECS.
Synced visual wheel models to physics wheels reliably.
Built tuning/debug controls for handling and stability.

projects.title: SSAO vs HBAO Study
projects.summary: Side-by-side quality/perf comparison including Alchemy SSAO.
body: Compared SSAO, HBAO, and Alchemy SSAO using consistent camera presets.
Measured performance and artifact patterns across scenes.
